data.title: Colorado State University
data.text:
2020 (r-Jr.) | 4/4: Started all four games in his first season in a Colorado State uniform ... Main role was as a blocking tight end in 12 personnel.

Before CSU: Spent three years at the University of Miami, appearing in 14 career games ... Limited to just two games as a sophomore due to a season-ending injury ... Played in six games as a junior, starting one, the Independence Bowl ... His lone reception came as a sophomore, good for 14 yards.

HS/Misc.: Consensus three-star tight end prospect by 247Sports, ESPN, Rivals and Scout ... Ranked No. 11 tight end nationwide by ESPN ... Ranked No. 20 tight end in 247Sportsâ€™ Composite Rankings ... Rated No. 27 tight end by Rivals ... Born in Eugene, Ore., and grew up in state of Washington ... Finished junior year with nine receptions for 117 yards and two touchdowns ... Coached by John Walsh at Guyer ... Chose Miami over offers from Arkansas, Colorado, Houston and Michigan, among others.
